summary: Iteration 5 - FINAL PRE-DEPLOYMENT VERIFICATION COMPLETE. All 3 user-reported issues are fixed and verified: 1) Project thumbnails now VISIBLE on Work page (6/6 images with opacity=1), 2) Hover-to-play feature REMOVED (no auto-play video on hover, only play button overlay), 3) Navigation bar REDESIGNED with clean styling, active tab orange background, and ADMIN link visible on all pages. Admin panel at /admin works correctly with all 8 tabs, View Site link, and aspect ratio field.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Projects endpoint returns 6 projects with YouTube thumbnails
All projects have aspectRatio field (default: 16:9)
Admin auth with password 'orbya2024' (200 OK)
Admin auth rejects wrong password (401)
Skills endpoint returns data
Config endpoint returns data (adminPassword hidden)
Quotes and Stats endpoints work
Work page (/work) loads with 6 project cards
All 6 project thumbnails VISIBLE (opacity=1) - YouTube auto-thumbnails
NO hover-to-play feature - hovering shows play button overlay only
No video/iframe elements created on hover (0 videos, 0 iframes)
Video modal opens on project card click
YouTube embed URL includes mute=1 for autoplay compliance
Category filters work (ALL, AI VIDEOS, PRODUCT VIDEOS)
Navigation bar visible on Home, Work, Skills, Contact pages
ADMIN link visible in navigation on ALL non-admin pages
Active tab has orange background (bg-[var(--primary)])
Clean nav design without overlapping border lines
Navigation bar HIDDEN on /admin page (returns null)
Admin login with 'orbya2024' succeeds
Admin panel shows: Projects, Skills, Media, Stats, Quotes, Config, Colors, Messages tabs
Admin header has 'View Site' link and 'Logout' button
Project edit form has Aspect Ratio field with 5 options
Aspect ratio options: 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Vertical/Reels), 1:1 (Square), 4:3 (Classic), 21:9 (Ultrawide)
Home page displays correctly with HUD elements
seed_data_creation: None - used existing project data with YouTube URLs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 user-reported issues are FIXED and VERIFIED: 1) Thumbnails visible - removed 'img[loading=lazy]{opacity:0}' CSS rule from App.css, ProjectCard.js uses auto YouTube thumbnails via getYouTubeThumb(), 2) Hover-to-play REMOVED - no video element on hover, only play button overlay, 3) Nav redesigned in Navigation.js with clean styling, ADMIN link added, returns null on /admin route. Backend tests: 15 passed (test_api.py) + 12 passed (test_iteration4_bugs.py). All features ready for deployment.

bug_fixes_verified.thumbnails_visible: VERIFIED - All 6 project cards show YouTube thumbnails (opacity=1), CSS rule 'img[loading=lazy]{opacity:0}' removed from App.css lines 84-87
bug_fixes_verified.hover_to_play_removed: VERIFIED - No video/iframe elements on hover, only play button overlay appears, video plays only when card is clicked (modal)
bug_fixes_verified.navigation_redesigned: VERIFIED - Clean nav without border lines, active tab has orange background, ADMIN link visible on Home/Work/Skills/Contact pages, nav hidden on /admin
bug_fixes_verified.admin_panel_working: VERIFIED - Login with 'orbya2024', all 8 tabs functional, View Site link, Logout button, Aspect Ratio field in project form
